charges.charge_description: Conspiracy to knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute approximately 167 kilograms of marijuana. 21:846, 841(a)(1), and 841(b)(1)(B). Date of Offense: November 25, 1997. Penalty: Not less than 5 years nor more than 40 years imprisonment without probation, parole or suspended sentence, a fine of up to $2 million, at least 4 years SRT and a $100.00 special assessment. (1)

Aiding, abetting, and assisting one another to knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute approximately 167 kilograms of marijuana. 21:841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(B) and 18:2. Date of Offense: November 25, 1997. Penalty: Not less than 5 years nor more than 40 years imprisonment without probation, parole or suspended sentence, a fine of up to $2 million, at least 4 years SRT, and $100.00 special assessment. (2)

Knowingly, intentionally and unlawfully possess with intent to distribute a controlled substance in Schedule I of the controlled substance Act of 1970, to wit: 378 pounds (approximate gross weight) of marijuana. 21:841(a)(1) [2:97-m-301]

Conspiracy to knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute approximately 167 kilograms of marijuana. 21:846, 841(a)(1), and 841(b)(1)(B). Date of Offense: November 25, 1997. Penalty: Not less than 5 years nor more than 40 years imprisonment without probation, parole or suspended sentence, a fine of up to $2 million, at least 4 years SRT and a $100.00 special assessment. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 40 months (concurrent), 4 years Supervised Release Term, $200.00 fine, $200.00 special assessment (1)
